text: simple radar is a project currently
worked on by are done he was able to
release version 3.0 just a few days ago
and that's what I'm focusing on for this

the link below so what is simple radar
for the people that don't know it's
basically custom or modified map
overviews your radar in-game is in
charge of showing you these map
overviews and here's the difference it
makes all these are stored in here in
case you didn't know and they are always
named after the map that they are for
what simple radar does so well says in
the actual title it simplifies the map
overviews even though valve has updated
their own map overviews for panorama
simple radar still comes with neat
features such as the high contrast color
scheme which makes it easier to locate
enemies on the map will using simple
radar help you in any way it could but
I'm not entirely sure it will I would
say it's mostly for visuals but it
definitely makes the radar cleaner so
you might be able to read your
surroundings better just from that so
what is new with version 3.0 with this
version you can now customize the map
overviews with some useful options
choosing background will allow you to
change from the current panorama to just
a clean background when you add layers
you can include patterns which will show
you indoor areas and also by zones which
is new to simple radar finally you can
choose if you want call out names on the
maps which is great for new players or
just for people that forget what some
things are called
if you want the call-outs to be shown
when you are in game make sure you tick
this when you are done simply click on
download current to get your files when
you have your files all you need to do
now is to replace them with the current
files you have installed by default if
you really need to take a backup first
before replacing them and
you can't get back banned for using
these modified images some sites may be
against modified files in general under
their terms of use I know that face it
for example are fine with simple radar
but it can be a good idea to check
whatever site you're going to use before
installing do I recommend simple radar I
don't see why you wouldn't want to use
it so yeah I do
it's just that I don't think it will
give you a much better advantage than
anyone else it just looks better in my
opinion
